backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles and coin management with add-funds, withdrawals, balances, and transaction history using Maps and simple idempotency checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing removed auth, CTR validation, and connection-config UI components with associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for numerous frontend components and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables defining color tokens, dark mode values, and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/ic-config.json: Empty configuration file placeholder for IC environment settings.
frontend/PUBLISHING.md: Documentation outlining prerequisites and steps for deploying the app to the Internet Computer mainnet.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component rendering header, navigation, section routing, and footer using flowStore state.
frontend/src/components/auth/EmailPasswo: Empty placeholder file for removed email/password auth.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignInOptio: Empty placeholder file for removed sign-in options.
frontend/src/components/auth/ThirdPartyA: Empty placeholder file for removed auth dialog.
frontend/src/components/connection/Backe: Stub component returning null because backend config banners were removed.
Stub component returning null because reachability UI was removed.
frontend/src/components/connection/Confi: Stub component returning null because config initialization UI was removed.
frontend/src/components/connection/Offli: Stub component returning null because offline notices were removed.
frontend/src/components/header/HeaderAut: Stub component returning null because authentication UI was removed.
frontend/src/components/header/HeaderBal: Displays current coin balance using backend query and formatted output with coin icon.
frontend/src/components/nav/HamburgerMen: Responsive slide-out menu enabling navigation between app sections using flowStore.
frontend/src/components/scan-earn/ActorC: Empty placeholder component for potential actor-call error UI.
frontend/src/components/scan-earn/AddFun: Modal for adding funds via UPI, handling QR display, UPI ID copy, app links, and transaction submission.
frontend/src/components/scan-earn/CoinCo: Displays animated coin balance fetched from backend.
frontend/src/components/scan-earn/Connec: Placeholder returning null; no settings UI.
frontend/src/components/scan-earn/CtrCon: Placeholder returning null; no CTR connection UI.
frontend/src/components/scan-earn/FaceVe: Placeholder returning null; no face verification UI.
frontend/src/components/scan-earn/Reward: Displays coin purchase tiers with ROI and lets users select a package.
frontend/src/components/scan-earn/Wallet: Wallet dashboard showing balance, add-funds button, and withdrawal panel.
frontend/src/components/scan-earn/Withdr: UI for withdrawing coins with quick amounts, validation, and transaction submission.
frontend/src/components/sections/Custome: AI chat-style customer support interface with rule-based responses.
frontend/src/components/sections/StocksF: Section showing reward tiers, add-funds history, and modal for adding funds.
frontend/src/components/sections/Withdra: Withdrawal UI with action panel and withdrawal history list.
frontend/src/components/support/ruleBase: Defines keyword-based customer support intents and returns canned responses via a simple matching function.
frontend/src/components/trading/HighLowT: Renders a live trading chart with simulated data, showing high/low values and current movement indicators.
frontend/src/components/transactions/Add: Displays add-funds transaction history with loading, error, and empty states using data from a query hook.
frontend/src/components/transactions/Wit: Shows withdrawal history in a table with loading, error, and no-data handling.
frontend/src/config/icEnv.ts: Provides a cached Internet Computer environment config with hardcoded production canister settings.
frontend/src/config/rewardTiers.ts: Defines INR-to-coin reward tiers as a static list.
frontend/src/config/upi.ts: Stores UPI payment details and generates UPI deep-link URLs for payments.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorResilient.ts: Creates an anonymous backend actor with retry logic and exposes loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReachabilit: Checks backend reachability by calling a lightweight health-check on an anonymous actor with timeout handling.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Provides helpers for formatting INR values, coin counts, and stripping non-digit characters.
frontend/src/lib/icErrorParser.ts: Defines a structured IC error model and utilities to parse unknown errors, extract details, and classify common IC error types.
frontend/src/lib/sessionUserId.ts: Generates a cryptographically random session user ID in USER-XXXXXXXX format.
frontend/src/lib/supportedLogin.ts: Empty placeholder file for login-related definitions.
frontend/src/lib/supportEmail.ts: Builds Gmail and mailto URLs and opens a prefilled support email with fallback behavior.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a helper that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/state/flowStore.ts: Zustand store managing selected purchase tier and active UI section with reset helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Empty placeholder file for WhatsApp-related utilities.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, spacing, shadows, keyframes, and plugin settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing requirements to remove authentication and canister systems and simplify app access.
